Does anyone know if you can submit pictures to them, or where that would be?

Hey PLS Beast! Art from the Community Creation spotlights are mainly sourced from portfolio and social media sites. - If you tag your pieces with a champ's name or skin, there's a good chance we'll see it. =) You can also send fan art my way on Twitter (@RiotJynx). Thanks!
